377,1/1/1980 00:00,2,en,Female,18 - 25 Years,Undergraduate,,4th year,Main Campus Karen,Karen,,Other,Rift valley ,Yes,No,No,,1,3,4th born,Urban,Self sponsored,No,No,Yes,No,No,No,,No,Drinking,Smoking,Smoking,Sniffing,Not Sure,Injecting,Sniffing,Chewing,Injecting,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,No,N/A,10,0,5,0,0,0,0,0,0,Yes,Yes,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,No,,Yes,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,,Yes,Yes,No,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,Yes,No,No,,Good,Yes,"This is because most students don't have anything of importance to keep them busy and focused. ",Yes,No,No,No,Yes,More out of book activities,,,,,,,,,N/A,"More physical sessions of guidance and counseling. Through holding events of real situation talks from people who have recovered from the drug problem.
